did.head: Collection Overview
did.abstract: Journalist and television producer. Included are writings, correspondence, memos, and notes related to Sangers' production of television sports coverage for ABC.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Born Hong Kong, 1929; graduate Smith College, 1950; married Robert N. Riger; had four children. Was later married to [?] Keys. From 1958-66, worked at WNBC-TV New York, first as a production assitant, then as producer of "The Open Mind," then Manager of Public Affairs. Writer and producer for ABC News, 1966-68; produced shows related to the Olympics and promotional films for ABC Sports, 1968- retirement; wrote and produced landmark prime-time specials on women's sports; first woman to hold a full producership and executiveposition in network sports; served as director of the Women's Sports Foundation. Won two Emmy awards; Smith College medal, 1982.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, appointment books, films, videotapes, printed material, organization files, and writings. Strengths of the collection include writings, correspondence, memos, and notes related to Sangers' production of television sports coverage for ABC, as well as her professional relationships with top ABC executives such as Roone Arledge, John Martin and Chuck Howard.
NOTE: The container list for this collection is available in the Sophia Smith Collection. Please contact us to request a copy.

accessrestrict.p: The papers are open to research according to the regulations of the Sophia Smith Collection.
This collection has not been fully processed and therefore may be difficult to use.

userestrict.p: The Sophia Smith Collection owns copyright to the unpublished works by the creator of this collection. Copyright to materials created by others may be owned by those individuals or their heirs or assigns. Permission must be obtained to publish reproductions or quotations beyond "fair use." It is the responsibility of the researcher to identify and satisfy the holders of all copyrights.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Eleanor Sanger Papers, Sophia Smith Collection, Smith College, Northampton, Mass.

accruals.head: Additions to the Collection
accruals.p: Periodic additions to collection are expected and may not be reflected in this record.
